[Goloma Courage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2806) <actions string="" />

<trait label="Goloma" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=381" />

---

The most important thing you've learned living with fear is how to overcome it. When you roll a success on a saving throw against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, you get a critical success instead. In addition, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves against fear effects and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Will DC against attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) you.
